text: “Egh nɨ Aron amɨsevegh gɨvagh, egh an otariba inigh izɨ korotiar ruarir aven azuiba me daghuigh, egh inir ruariba men ivariabagh ikegh, egh inir dapanir asuar oteviba men dapanibagh ikegh. Egh nɨ kamaghɨn damigh Aron uan otariba ko me amɨseveghtɨ, me ofa gamir gumazibar otivigham. Eghtɨ, gumazir kaba uan ovavir boriba ko zurara ofa gamir gumazibar ingangarim damu, bizir kɨ damuasa mɨkemezibar amu mamaghɨra ikiam.
